mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN stay s ON r.reservation_code = s.reservation_code WHERE r.checkin_date = #{today} AND r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND r.canceled_at IS NULL AND s.stay_code IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s INNER JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code WHERE r.checkout_date = #{today} AND r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND r.canceled_at IS NULL AND s.actual_checkin_at IS NOT NULL AND s.actual_checkout_at IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.stay_code = s.stay_code )
